resource: 1003196.vtc=true 1003196.1002622.description=These lights turn on when the “POWER” switch is turned to the ONmode to indicate that a system check is being performed. They will turn off after the hybrid system is on, or after a few seconds. There may be a malfunction in a system if a light does not come on, or if the lights do not turn off. Have the vehicle inspected by your Toyota dealer. 1003196.source=MANUAL_IMPORT 1003196.description=These lights turn on when the “POWER” switch is turned to the ONmode to indicate that a system check is being performed. They will turn off after the hybrid system is on, or after a few seconds. There may be a malfunction in a system if a light does not come on, or if the lights do not turn off. Have the vehicle inspected by your Toyota dealer.
